items.title: USD strengthens against EUR after positive jobs report
items.summary: The dollar rallied after better-than-expected employment numbers in the US, prompting central bank watchers to reassess timelines.

items.title: Emerging market currencies show resilience amid rate cuts
items.summary: Some emerging market currencies have started to recover as local rate cuts and stabilizing commodity prices improve sentiment.

items.title: What the latest CPI means for currency traders
items.summary: Analysts break down the consumer price index reading and what to expect for central bank decisions over the coming quarters.
